name: Caution! Sniper!
description:
Caution! There is a sniper that can kill you, if you don't do as he says!

Now with endless procedurally generated world!

W S A D - Moving

E - Talking

Space - Hitting

For the game to work on Linux, you need SFML libraries:

sudo apt-get install libsfml-dev

Code here: https://github.com/Qlbert931/Ludum_Dare_50
